GameData.Language_ko_KR:
{1_CivName:textkey} is their current Ally. Until their [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sphere of Influence[ENDCOLOR] is removed, you cannot remove them from this position.
Because there is an active [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Open Door Policy[ENDCOLOR] in effect here, no one can become this City-State's Ally.
영향권
Demand a Sphere of Influence over a City-State. If successful, the proposing player becomes the permanent Ally of the City-State (unless this Proposal is repealed). [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]증기력[ENDCOLOR]을 연구한 문명이 있어야 안건으로 채택할 수 있습니다.
영향권: {1_CivsList}
{@1_CivName} ({@2_CivName}에 대한) /
탈식민지화
Enforce decolonization on a Player. If successful, the Player's [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence is lowered to 50 with all non-Permanent City-State allies. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]라디오[ENDCOLOR]를 연구한 문명이 있어야 안건으로 채택할 수 있습니다.
문호 개방
문호 개방: {1_CivsList}
{@1_CivName}
Enact an Open Door policy for a City-State. If successful, all civilizations will immediately have their [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence set at 40 with the City-State, and no one can become the City-State's Ally until this Proposal is repealed.
{@1_CityName}
{1_CivAdj}
Choose a City-State for the resolution to affect
우주 비행 규제
Spaceflight Regulations control the proliferation of modern ballistic technology, oversee national space programs, and limit the advance of pontentially-dangerous technology. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As long as this resolution is active, all players will suffer a global -25% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production penalty for [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Parts, +25% [ICON_GOLD] Gold purchase costs for [ICON_VICTORY_SPACE] Spaceship Parts, and +25% [ICON_PEACE] Faith costs for Engineers.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]원자론[ENDCOLOR]을 연구한 문명이 있어야 안건으로 채택할 수 있습니다.
{1_Spaceship}% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building SS Parts
+{1_Spaceship}% costs for [ICON_GOLD] Gold purchases of SS parts and [ICON_PEACE] Faith purchases of Great Engineers
카수스 벨리
The world recognizes the need for justifiable war to resolve diplomatic disputes. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While this resolution is active, unit maintenance costs are lowered by 15% [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger penalties for capturing cities and declaring war are greatly reduced, and [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger scores decay much more rapidly than normal.
{1_UnitMaintenancePercent}% [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost for Unit Maintenance. [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger penalties greatly decreased
+{1_UnitMaintenancePercent}% [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost for Unit Maintenance. [ICON_VICTORY_DOMINATION] Warmonger penalties unchanged.
냉전
Ideological differences have pushed the world into a cold war, and economic and political factions are forming based on ideology alone. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While this resolution is active, players may only make [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes with civilizations that follow the same ideology, or with allied City-States. Furthermore, [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence levels with allied City-States do not decline. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]원자론[ENDCOLOR]을 연구한 문명이 있어야 안건으로 채택할 수 있습니다.
No [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes with Ideological opponents or non-allied City-States. Allied City-State [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence does not decay.
Prevented by an active or proposed resolution.
Unavailable until a World Ideology is active.
Boost to [ICON_FOOD]/[ICON_RESEARCH] for Civilizations with Scores below global average. +{1_GreatPersonRateMod}% generation rate for {2_GreatPersonList}
Boost to [ICON_PRODUCTION]/[ICON_CULTURE] for Civilizations with Scores below global average. +{1_GreatPersonRateMod}% generation rate for {2_GreatPersonList}
